import "./bookticket.css"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Movies } from "./Moviedata"; import Image1 from "../images/movies_screen/screen.png"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Bookticket(props) { const [mov, setmov] = useState([]) const { movieid } = useParams(); console.log("movieeid===>",movieid); const ref = useRef(null); console.log(ref); const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [Price, setPrice] = useState(0); function changecolor(e) { if (e.target.className !== "row") { if (e.target.style.background !== "green") { e.target.style.background = "green"; setCount(count + 1); setPrice(Price + 150); } else { e.target.style.background = " #01163E"; setCount(count - 1); setPrice(Price - 150); } } } const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
